features.name: Organize Tasks
features.description: Add, organize and manage tasks in an easy way.

features.name: Access Anywhere
features.description: Accessible on web and multiple mobile platforms.

features.name: Search
features.description: Easily search for tasks based on filters

features.name: Protection
features.description: Protect your task for unauthorized access

features.name: Notes
features.description: Add notes to keep everything together

features.name: Schedule
features.description: Schedule commencement of work on task.

features.name: Set status
features.description: Mark status of tasks e.g. "In Progress" or "Complete"

features.name: Lists
features.description: Keep related tasks and projects together e.g. based on location, client etc.

features.name: Tags
features.description: Manage your tags, assign them to tasks and quickly find tagged tasks

platforms.name: Web
platforms.description: Access your tasks through the web

platforms.name: Android Mobile and Tabs
platforms.description: Access your tasks through Android phone and tabs

platforms.description: Access your tasks through Windows mobile and tabs
